ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Horn of Shadows
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I *did* check the spreadsheet.  I m using 3.17 from EQDiva, and there s no mention of Torin s Horn anywhere on there. I just double-checked it.  So where
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:18 PM 10/14/02 -0500, you wrote:
> >>On another topic, what's a good way to test "Torin's Horn" for bonus
>percentage? I'm a level 20 Bard on Karana now, and I have a Combine
>Horn
>and Torin's, and I want to get some testing done on it.<<
>
>
>You may want to check out Reed's bardsong Excel file. Torin's horn has
>an approximate modifier of 2.2 on brass song, as compared to a standard
>horn's 2.0, and voice of 1.0. The combine horn has the same modifier as
>Torin's Horn.
>
>Hope this helps you out!

I *did* check the spreadsheet. I'm using 3.17 from EQDiva, and there's no
mention of Torin's Horn anywhere on there.

I just double-checked it. So where is the version you're getting that info
from?

Talies
